ValidationRule.description: User must enter Decided by Risk date when Opportunity Date is Proposed, Closed Lost, Closed Disqualified or Closed Duplicate
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISNULL( Decided_by_Risk__c ) && IsWelcomePackSent__c = FALSE && Opportunity__r.IsAPMSApplication__c = TRUE && ( OR ( (ISPICKVAL( Opportunity__r.StageName, 'Propose' )), (ISPICKVAL( Opportunity__r.StageName, 'Closed Lost' )), (ISPICKVAL( Opportunity__r.StageName, 'Closed Disqualified' )), (ISPICKVAL( Opportunity__r.StageName, 'Closed Duplicate' )) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter date when application has been decided by Risk
